thread.title: This Celebrity Was The First To Meet Karan Johar’s Twin Babies
thread.title_full: This Celebrity Was The First To Meet Karan Johar’s Twin Babies

author: Divya Rao
title: This Celebrity Was The First To Meet Karan Johar’s Twin Babies
text:
Divya Rao Mar . 27 . 2017 Ranbir Kapoor, Karan Johar, Ayan Mukerji 
Karan Johar made us all immensely happy when he announced that he became a father to twins Yash and Roohi through surrogacy. It was a well kept secret and only Gauri Khan , Manish Malhotra and Kareena Kapoor knew about it. The twins are unfortunately still in the hospital as they were born prematurely but Karan goes and visits them ever so often. Yesterday, he took his close friend and director Ayan Mukherjee to meet the babies, making him the first to visit them at the hospital. Aww! 
We hope they get home soon. :) 19
